about.title: About
about.summary: Computer Science student, MEI since 2025, working in the SAP ecosystem since 2022 (SAPUI5/Fiori, BTP, ABAP/RAP) with a strong foundation in modern web development.
about.hook: Bridging robust SAP backends with modern, fluid, consistent user interfaces.

highlights: Support and evolution of SAP Fiori/UI5 applications and ABAP objects in SAP S/4HANA and SAP BTP environments.
Delivery with OData services, CDS Views and RAP (ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model) focused on consistency and performance.
Production fixes and enhancements with an emphasis on reliability, usability and alignment with business processes.

subtopics.title: Client/Allocation: SIPAL — Agricultural Optimization
items: Development and optimization of SAPUI5/Fiori apps to modernize agricultural management processes.
OData services based on CDS Views and RAP for UI consumption with lower coupling.
UX and performance improvements oriented to fast execution for field and back-office teams.

subtopics.title: Client/Allocation: BRF — AppGrãos
items: Hybrid SAPUI5 application with offline support and synchronization for low-connectivity scenarios.
Data modeling and integration with SAP backend via OData, focusing on consistency and traceability.
Delivery of critical flows (e.g., freight calculation and validations) with productivity-oriented UX.

subtopics.title: São Salvador Alimentos (SSA) — SAP Technical Support (ABAP, Fiori and Asset Manager)
items: Provided support and continuous improvement for SAP solutions, focusing on reliability, traceability and delivery agility.
Resolved functional and technical tickets with fixes and enhancements in CDS Views, OData services and ABAP logic.
Maintained and evolved Fiori freestyle apps and custom extensions over standard SAP modules, aligning the system to client processes.
Worked with Eclipse ADT, versioning and transports via TASK/TR.
Delivered SAP Asset Manager configurations and technical extensions to align the app with maintenance and asset management flows.

subtopics.title: Client/Allocation: LIGGA
items: Support and evolution of SAP solutions, focusing on technical fixes, stability and continuous improvement.

highlights: Built systems for the agribusiness auction domain, improving operational flow and UX consistency.
Implemented integrations and backend business flows with Node.js and SQL, reducing rework and operational failures.
Delivered responsive UI with a focus on performance and usability.
Built SAPUI5 freestyle applications and Fiori templates focused on usability, standards and performance.
Worked on SAP BTP (Neo) using Web IDE and SAP Business Application Studio (BAS), covering development, deployment and support.
Integrated with SAP backends via OData, keeping API contracts predictable and layers decoupled.
Contributed full stack in JavaScript/Node.js and front-end (React/HTML/CSS) when required by the project.
